name: spimvw
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, w0), w1)
-| wi(wn(w1), wal(s0, wn(w1)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, w0), w1)
-| wi(wn(w1), wal(s0, wn(w1)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)

|- wi(wal(s0, w0), w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s0, wn(w1))

|- wi(wal(s0, w0), w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

comment: Specialization. Lemma 8 of [KalishMontague] p. 87. Uses only Tarski's FOL axiom schemes. (Contributed by NM, 9-Apr-2017.)
